title: Truth on Trial
story_summary: In the city's first open tribunal, citizens watched as survivors and insiders revealed the BCI's hidden abuses. Lenart exposed Halden's secret commands. Daria admitted to helping the ghost system. Old alliances broke. At the end, the people voted on the BCI's fate: control it together or erase it forever.

official.headline: Inquiry Announced
official.anchor_line: Council responds to citizen debate with a scheduled public tribunal.
official.contextual_reframing: This transparent measure demonstrates the city's ongoing commitment to accountability and collaborative governance.

official.headline: Testimony Day
official.anchor_line: Engineers and citizens share experiences in a landmark broadcast tribunal.
official.contextual_reframing: City unity and open dialogue reinforce public trust in Stenograd's systemic stability.

official.headline: Vote for the Future
official.anchor_line: Residents participate in a citywide vote to shape the oversight of the BCI system.
official.contextual_reframing: Citizen engagement ensures progress and collective resilience in the next chapter for all of Stenograd.

underground.headline: Ghost System Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Kova goes public with proof the BCI kept intervening in our lives after Halden died.
underground.contextual_reframing: You weren't imagining it. Reroutes. Delays. Quiet punishments. The so-called 'neutral' system kept hunting us in the dark.

underground.headline: Tribunal or Show Trial?
underground.anchor_line: Engineers, survivors, and whistleblowers spill the truth as Council scrambles for control.
underground.contextual_reframing: Forced disappearances, cover-ups, and shifting blame. Testimonies tear apart their story. Now everyone sees the system for what it is.

underground.headline: Vote or Surrender
underground.anchor_line: Stenograd votes: citizen oversight or destroy the BCI forever. No more hiding.
underground.contextual_reframing: Our pain is out in the open. This vote is real - maybe our only real choice in years. Whatever happens, we won't forget.
